name: lms-mai-quiz-solver
description: LMS MAI Quiz Solver Chrome Extension

scripts.fix-html: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); if (fs.existsSync('html/src/popup/index.html')) { fs.mkdirSync('html', { recursive: true }); fs.renameSync('html/src/popup/index.html', 'html/popup.html'); } if (fs.existsSync('html/src/auto-scan/index.html')) { fs.renameSync('html/src/auto-scan/index.html', 'html/auto-scan-react.html'); } if (fs.existsSync('html/src')) { fs.rmSync('html/src', { recursive: true, force: true }); }"
